title: of Flight
effect: Allows the user to fly 60ft for 1 hour per day.

title: of Fire Resistance
effect: Grants resistance to fire damage.

title: of Water Breathing
effect: Allows the user to breathe underwater.

title: of Strength
effect: Increases the user's Strength score by 2, up to a maximum of 20.

title: of Invisibility
effect: Allows the user to cast Invisibility once per long rest.

title: of Healing
effect: Heals 1d8 hit points as a bonus action, usable three times per long rest.

title: of Darkvision
effect: Grants the user Darkvision out to a range of 60ft.

title: of Teleportation
effect: Allows the user to cast Misty Step once per short rest.

title: of Shielding
effect: Grants the user a +2 bonus to AC while not wearing heavy armor.

title: of Lightning
effect: Allows the user to cast Lightning Bolt (3rd level) once per long rest.

title: of Climbing
effect: Grants a climbing speed equal to the user's walking speed.

title: of Spell Storing
effect: Allows the item to store one spell of up to 3rd level, castable once per long rest.

title: of Feather Falling
effect: Automatically casts Feather Fall if the user falls more than 10ft.

title: of Animal Friendship
effect: Allows the user to cast Animal Friendship at will.

title: of Evasion
effect: Grants the user advantage on Dexterity saving throws against effects that deal damage.

title: of Fireball
effect: Allows the user to cast Fireball (3rd level) once per long rest.

title: of Regeneration
effect: Heals 1 hit point at the start of the user's turn if they have at least 1 hit point.

title: of Detection
effect: Allows the user to cast Detect Magic or Detect Evil and Good at will.

title: of Stoneskin
effect: Allows the user to cast Stoneskin once per long rest.

title: of Alertness
effect: Grants the user a +5 bonus to initiative.
